website_summaries.verdict: Pliers set that provides only the basics, but these three tools work well at a good price point.
pros: Nice collection of three pliers that will work to complete simple jobs for homeowners
Rubber handles provide a secure grip for whatever job you're trying to accomplish
Cutting pliers will maintain their sharp edges over time
With proper care, you'll be able to make use of this pliers set for years
cons: 6-inch tools are too small to work well for tough jobs
Rubber sleeves on handles will slip off

customer_reviews.title: Stanley hand tools seem to be improving
customer_reviews.text: These three pliers are not fancy, not top of the line, but they don't need to be. The bi-metal construction is surprising for such low-priced and mundane tools. Handles are comfortable and grip is fine. Bought these to replace 30-year old pliers that had loosened. I expect these to last that long and be in better shape. My opinion of Stanley tools has improved in the last few years. I don't care if they are made in China, so long as Stanley's specs are demanding and are applied diligently by the manufacturer. That appears to be the case here.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly terrible
customer_reviews.text: Both sets I've purchased had the rubber peel right off the handles with minimal usage. I have no idea why. I was actually just teaching my daughter how to use them and the handles degraded in my hand. I have a similar set from 25 years ago going strong. I must have had the two new ones I ordered for my gradually building my kids move-out tool kit come from a bad lot.
customer_reviews.author: brian johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good for price.
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed that some Stanley tools now come coated in factory grease, which is super unfortunate for people that need tools in a clean(er) environment. I bought these to have something in my go-bag, they'll work but the grease is not the best.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're nice! I use them maybe once a week, and for that level of work, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Dara K.

customer_reviews.title: Love Stanley tools! :D
customer_reviews.text: These are such good pliers. They are perfect,I feel like they will last my life. the handles are really comfortable, and the metal it's made out of is not cheap at all, they all have really good grip and are beautifully crafted tools
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Travel Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the traveling IT guy! All of these measure in under 7in which is the TSA max for hand tools. Work well for small jobs, if you are doing bigger jobs you will want longer handles for the leverage.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn W

customer_reviews.title: Good value in cheap tools
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap tools and the size fits nicely in your hand. The pliers are a bit loose and it would really be nice it the needle nose had a spring to make it default to its closed position. Overall though, a good set at a great price. I'm sure I'll misuse them so it's good they're cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Xtra

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tools that will hold up for daily use
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tools that will hold up for daily use. I purchased to replace my old ones and those lasted 6 yrs of hard labor work. These are of even better quality then my last set.
customer_reviews.author: kevin huffman

customer_reviews.title: Useful and durable
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, good to have around the house. I am not a professional, but I am very pleased with these tools. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Korman

customer_reviews.title: Rusty Stanley Pliers.  Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: These seem so well made - and they're sturdy and the handles feel great. However; they rust for no darned reason at all. As near as I can figure; they rust because they're exposed to the air. Very disappointed with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Connie Sue Payne

customer_reviews.title: Stanley = Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent as always with Stanley products. You know what you’re getting...quality!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Prinz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design with  heavy insulation to prevent electrical shock
customer_reviews.text: These tools have additional features so that an additional tool is not needed. Quality tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same pliers that you receive...
customer_reviews.text: The handles on the pliers have rivets and are not smooth as shown. Thus, they collect a lot of muck, dirt, debris, etc.
customer_reviews.author: DRock

customer_reviews.title: For starter tool set gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought with other essential items as a starter tool set for grandson. I considered keeping these myself and giving him my well-used tools, but couldn't do it. The handles are comfortable but large. I don't know how long they'll last, but they're excellent for now.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: The handles aren't very comfortable. The black part is rough and didn't need to be. This is a nice quality set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Another opinion

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this plier set and then also having the warranty which is nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to create a small, basic tool kit for myself (a single woman). Stanley is a highly-regarded brand, known to be strong and reliable. This is the cheapest price I could find - both on the internet and through stores.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Quality tools IMO...
customer_reviews.text: These are Stanley products, and as such, they do seem to be of good quality....handles are grippy and comfortable, and price was fair...would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dancel

customer_reviews.title: perfect value for money
customer_reviews.text: the grip is amazing. 6" is perfect for a man. great finishing. the adjustable plier is somehow useless but the cutter and the nose pliers are amazing
customer_reviews.author: RakanG

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety to cover most plier needs, good grip, I would get it again.
customer_reviews.text: Decent tool set, seems solid in construction, but I haven't gotten to use all the types yet. However, the rubber handles are a nice touch for a better grip.
customer_reviews.author: CSH

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, and good variety for most things I can think of that I would attempt to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: JillinoisRNTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter set
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for someone who needed in house tools. Is a good brand for home projects but not heavy duty work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stanley three piece pliers.
customer_reviews.text: Used only one as I just got them. They seem well made and the price was very good. Fast delivery. Im satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Bell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rate this item as I brought it for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: By Pass

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just got these last week and I'm very pleased so far. The quality seems great for the price, and the handles are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: They're Stanley quality for the do-it-yourselfer
customer_reviews.text: As a construction carpenter, I'm hard on tools. I've used Stanley tools on the job and they last pretty good for the price. They do just fine around the house.
customer_reviews.author: trid2bnrml

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Good product at a good price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it but plier is not that good holding condition, its very loose. ok for the price
customer_reviews.author: isthikar

customer_reviews.title: These are great hand tools
customer_reviews.text: These are great hand tools. The grips make these so easy to handle and make your task much simpler.
customer_reviews.author: happypop

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Grips are great. Full size unlike some of the other pliers sets you see.
customer_reviews.author: GreatScott

customer_reviews.title: I have not used these yet but for my mild ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these yet but for my mild use, I am confident they will do the job. Stanley tools have never failed me.
customer_reviews.author: Val J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of pliers
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of tools for ordinary household chores. Price was quite reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Carnac767

customer_reviews.title: So glad it got them
customer_reviews.text: Just what anyone needs for the home. Don't need them every day but when you do and it's not there, major groan. So glad it got them.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Bright yellow so you can spot them ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Bright yellow so you can spot them if you misplace them.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonRocks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As usual top notch quality just like I have come to expect from Stanley Tools!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard T Roberts II

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I am always looking for an excuse to use them!
customer_reviews.author: majecabapa

customer_reviews.title: not very comfortable grip for longer term use
customer_reviews.text: Hard plastic handles, not very comfortable grip for longer term use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Novak

customer_reviews.title: Gift giver and gift recipient very pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for a family member. Gift giver and gift recipient very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: anthony v. szumski

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Value
customer_reviews.text: Product was just what it was advertised as. Good quality for the price. I am very happy with the products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my fiance since he does some electrical work, he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Stanley pliers set
customer_reviews.text: I don't have plans to use these for heavy-duty work. Just occasional light stuff. Recently moved from a house to an apartment, and all my "house things" haven't yet arrived. This set of Stanley pliers (and another order's set of Stanley screwdrivers) are like Linus' blanket: I feel naked without some basic tools around me. I anticipate that these will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Handles are yellow, not black as pictured. Pliers ...
customer_reviews.text: Handles are yellow, not black as pictured. Pliers work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Tramontano

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for working on crafts. The are perfect for that and at a great price I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Herriage

customer_reviews.title: Not Your Father's Stanley Tools - BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Stanley Tools should be embarrassed to sell such crap! Simply pick up the tools and the feel is absolutely junk. The metal used must be of some foreign, poor hardness grade. The first time I used the 6" long nose, they would not grip and function properly. The first time I used the 6" diagonal clipper, the cutting surface chipped and are no longer of use. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. By the time I got to use this product, it was past the 30 day return policy. Amazon return policy on tools needs to be at least 90 days. BOO to Stanley and DOUBLE BOO to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Yrlesru

product_meta.title: Stanley 84-056 3-Piece Bi-Material Pliers Set
product_meta.description:
Stanley 84-056 3-Piece Bi-Material Pliers Set

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Machined jaws help grip items securely. Cutting pliers feature induction hardened cutting edges for long life. includes: 6" Diagonal, 6" Long Nose, 6" Slip Joint.
feature_bullets: 6 inch diagonal, long nose & slip joint Pliers
Machined jaws help grip items securely
Cutting Pliers feature induction Hardened cutting edges for long life
Includes: 6" Diagonal, 6" Long nose, 6" Slip joint
Machined jaws help grip items securely
Cutting pliers feature induction hardened cutting edges for long life
includes: 6" Diagonal, 6" Long Nose, 6" Slip Joint

specifications.Warranty Description: Stanley warrants this product to the original purchaser for its useful life against deficiencies in material and workmanship. This LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY does not cover products that are improperly used, abused, altered or repaired. Deficient products will be replaced or repaired.
